item.description:
Alton Brown is coming to Brookline for his book tour! and it's exciting!!!

You can purchase your ticket ($5) by calling the bookstore at 617-566-6660, and get a chance to meet this cooking genius. I'm definitely bringing my camera, so I can take pictures with him. :)))

After the book signing, we can go out for dinner or drinks in the Coolidge Corner area.
Yay. I'm excited and hope you are too!

http://www.brooklineb...
http://www.coolidge.o...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Sun, (will email my number)
item.name: Alton Brown's book signing
